Title: Shalwar Kameez
Writer: Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Alex Gansa (developed for American television by), Howard Gordon (developed for American television by), Alexander Cary
Actors: Claire Danes, Rupert Friend, Nazanin Boniadi, Laila Robins
Plot: Carrie ventures a delicate alliance with the Pakistan's secretive Inter-Services Intelligence (ISI). Fara fails to recruit a key asset, forcing Carrie to intervene. After the events in Islamabad, Quinn zeroes in on a potential lead.
